name: Gem Fusion
description:
Use colored gems to get out of the dungeon! There are magical pedestals hidden around the dungeon. Use the pedestals to change the color of the gems so that they fit perfectly in their designated spots.

This was a project I did for my class in Scripting for 3D games. I hope you find it interesting and unique. Its a very short game, only 1 level. If you enjoyed this game and think it could be continued further developed leave a comment.
